summary: Configuration file for Categorized Favorites Menu for Enderal mod.
descriptionHtml:
This is configuration file for Categorized Favorites Menu for Enderal mod.

The config file was created and tested only during one playthrough of Enderal. It may be possible that I missed something and some items may
be in wrong categories. But I think that most of the stuff should be ok.
Feedback is appreciated.

[color=#f1c232][b]You need to have:[/b][/color]
1. [url=http://enderal.com/]Enderal[/url]
2. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4862/?]Categorized Favorites Menu
[/url]

[color=#f1c232][b]Installation:[/b][/color]
Use NMM.

Or manually download and unpack the file.
The file should go into your ...\Skyrim\Data\Interface\ folder.
Overwrite the old favoritesmenu.cfg if asked to (you may want to make a backup of your old favoritesmenu.cfg before overwriting it).

[color=#f1c232][b]
Credits:[/b][/color]
SureAi for Enderal
favmenumodder for Categorized Favorites Menu
author: Aasimar1
